revised_title: Pion-Nucleon Scattering and Excited Nucleon States: A Review of Recoil Proton Polarization Measurements
tldr: This article presents recoil proton polarization measurements in pion-nucleon elastic scattering, focusing on the analysis of excited nucleon states. The authors discuss the experimental setup, data analysis, and phase shift solutions for different energy ranges. The results provide insights into the behavior of phase shifts and partial amplitudes, confirming the existence of strong effects in nucleon excited states.
